attributes.action: immediately enact laws banning the research and practice of time travel, in order to preserve the integrity of the spacetime continuum.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allowing people to freely travel to (and alter) the past could have disastrous consequences. By modify a past series of events, a paradox may be created, drastically altering our history.

In order to protect and defend ourselves from such paradoxes, the Prime Minister needs to ban the research and practice of time travel, and encourage other world leaders to do the same.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
